mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of Daniel O. Conner
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of Daniel O. Conner J.W. Walton, Executor C.O. Conner, Executor J.P. Conner, Child S.W. Walton, Grandchild Martha W. Rierson, Grandchild Lorea B. Conner, Grandchild N.F. Walton, Grandchild E.G. Walton, Grandchild K.K. Walton, Grandchild Recorded in Ledger Book 5 page 74, in the Floyd County Courthouse. Date recorded as September 2nd, 1899 term
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
